document_data.name: Assur
document_data.mainbody: '''Assur''' was a small port city in [[Durpar]].  The city was destroyed by [[giants]] from the [[Beastlands]] but was rebuilt as a fortress city with a large garrison.  The city had a deep harbor and a large market.
